TypeScript 5.1 is now out! Now with:

- smarter checks for undefined-returning functions
- no restrictions between getter/setter types
- better checks against JSX tags
- linked editing for JSX
- @‚Å†param snippets
- new speed-ups

Read up more on our blog!https://t.co/7M0r2cbJIA

— TypeScript (@typescript) June 1, 2023

I read a couple of chapters of https://t.co/bQ62VdtRM7 by @GabrielVergnaud a year ago, my ts mental model has changed ever since.
Also @ecyrbedev 's tweets about the past challenges are very insightful.
Can't forget @mattpocockuk 's yt channel, tweets, https://t.co/jZs8t44KJ2

— Mostafa (@yoboigouda) December 13, 2023

I wrote a 2D game, entirely in type-level Typescript.

Yes, you read that right. This is flappy bird, written only in Typescript types.

How did I do it? It involves a lot of type magic, and a new type-level Typescript runtime I made in Rust + Zig.

Let me walk you through it: pic.twitter.com/d9nioc0tmJ

— zack (in SF) (@zack_overflow) October 19, 2023
